Header: Special opposition meeting to reach decision on budget vote
Content: COLOMBO (News 1st) – The vote on the third reading of the budget will take place tomorrow(April 05). A special discussion between President Maithripala Sirisena and opposition leader Mahinda Rajapaksa is to take place this evening to reach a final decision on how the opposition bloc will vote during the budget vote. The meeting is to take place at 4 pm at the parliamentary complex.
